transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan abhi clear aa rahi hogi sir.
Executive: Haan aa rahi hai aawaz.
Customer: Haan, to ab mai ye keh raha tha dekho lift aur lifting dono alag hi alag hota hai aisa to hai nahi ki usme kuch differentiate ho jaye ki aapko lift ki aa rahi hai lift ki jo aa rahi hai wo aap mujhe dikha sakte ho sir?
Customer: Aap dekho na kitni sari lift ki hai jitni bhi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Aap aap isme kyu nahi dekho na jitne lift ke lifting ke aa rahi hai lift ke aa rahi hai lifting ki to aa hi nahi rahi koi bolta hai char person ki lift chahiye mere ko che person ki lift chahiye mere ko do person ki lift chahiye mere ko wo to lift lagwane wala hai na uska kya hai usme bataiye usme kya mera koi karya hi nahi hai mera mai maine jo package liya isliye thodi liya ki mai yaha baitha rahunga free me aapko package de dunga aage agla agla plan mai kyu lunga mai aapse jab mere ko business nahi milega maine pehle bhi kai baar complaint kar chuka hu.
Executive: Jo personal aapko dikhte hai building lifting service likha hua hai lifting ke naam pe kai log dal dete hai. To isme aap kya dekh ke specially connect karte hai ki aisa kuch na nikle.
Customer: Are bhai meri baat mai meri baat nahi samajh rahe aapko che person ki lift hai to wo to lift le wo to lift ke liye mang rahe hai na do person ke lift chahiye mere ko do aadmi jisme wo lift chahiye jisme do aadmi ja sakte hai baith ke upar teen aadmi ja sakte hai che aadmi ja sakte hai wo wo mere liye mere kis kaam ki hai?
Executive: Nahi
Customer: Mere ko to burden mere ko to burden de rahi hai na wo mera matlab ke.
Executive: Ji
Customer: Mere paas kyu aa rahi hai wo inquiry?
Executive: To un inquiry isko sir aap delete matlab not relevant mark kar sakte hai sir. Unko mark karenge.
Customer: Mai mark mai mai mai mere ko maine isliye nahi maine IndiaMART ko isliye paisa de rakha hai ki mai waha se chatni karta rahu mai mark karta rahu mere ko mai naukar hu kya IndiaMART ka mai chatni karta rahunga mere ko jab mere ko meri inquiry nahi aayegi to mai us isko khol khol ke isliye baitha rahunga abhi yahi ye aati rahi year mai mark karta rahu.
Executive: Mark isliye keh raha hu.
Customer: Sir mai ye nahi keh raha hu ki aap kuch aur thing aap soch rahe ho ki hum log kyu nahi karenge aap kyu karenge aisa kuch nahi hai aapko buyer se connect karna hota hai theek hai na aapke paas jo lead aayi hai ab aapke kaam ki nahi aap usko kya karoge delete hi kar sakte ho.
Customer: Mera aap nahi samajh rahe bhai mera pura saal hai kyu aati hai mai isliye isliye baitha hu kya abhi jo nahi aati jab mere kaam ki nahi hai usko delete karunga mai isliye baitha hu kya maine paisa isliye diya hai kya kyu aa rahi hai mere paas ye mai aapke kyu hai aap kyu bhej rahe ho mere paas.
Executive: Sir ye specially aapke paas bheji jaati hai ye buyer ki galti hoti hai unhone lifting ke liye lift ka add dala hota hai category yaha pe lifting ki hi add hai house lifting service.
Customer: Wo galti wo buyer kon hai kon hai buyer wo?
Executive: Buyer sir aapko connect karte ho aapko dikhta hoga ki kon buyer hai mai ek baar dekhta hu isko isme kya kar sakta hu isme aap online aake dekh sakte ho mai filters aapko cheeze batau isme kaise hoga.
Customer: Mere ko mai nahi mujhe kuch nahi janna hai mujhe kuch nahi janna hai na mujhe filter chahiye na mujhe kuch chahiye agar mere ko inquiry de rahe ho to theek hai nahi de rahe ho to mera paisa refund kar do aapko aapka paisa aap se agar agle agle saal ka mai aap se package lunga hi nahi.
Executive: Aisa
Customer: Mujhe to main aapko sunai de main aap se tisri baat kuch nahi karni hai yadi aap mere ko inquiry de rahe ho to genuine do nahi to chhod do bas mai aapka agle saal aapka package lunga nahi mere do is do hi question hai aapke aur kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Mai bilkul samajh sakta hu is cheez ko and I am sorry aapko aisa face karna pada sir mai ek cheez batana chahta hu.
Executive: Theek hai jaise aap keh rahe hai ki matlab lifting kya hai to ek kaam kariye mai jo lead bhejunga usko connect kar sakte hai mai search karke bhejunga aapko whatsapp pe.
Customer: Haan to whatsapp pe bhejo mere par isi number pe whatsapp pe bhejo mai usko jo mere ko genuine lead de do chahe char hi de do minimum mere ko koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Genuine bhejo mere paas.
Executive: Dekho mai lift jo isme agar kahi bhi jara bhi mention mujhe lagega ki yaha pe ye lift lifting ke liye lift ka hai wo mai bilkul nahi bhejunga aapko theek hai.
Customer: Ji
Executive: Aur jo mere mere mere kaam se sambandhit inquiry bhejo aap.
Customer: Haan ji mai aapke aap se pehle baat hui hai ki aap ek cheez aur kar sakte ho waterproofing wagera me bhi hai aapka.
Executive: Nahi nahi koi nahi hai koi nahi hai kabhi ye kabhi waterproofing ka bhej rahe ho kabhi maid ka bhej rahe ho ye cheeze mere mere ko bataiye mere ko burden de rahe hai ye kya karenge.
Executive: Nahi mai confirm kar raha hu jisme isme bhi category aapki house lifting service me dekhiye add hai building kya hai services house lifting services category me add hai aur sath me buyer nahi likh rakha hai buyer is looking for waterproofing of wall.
Customer: Haan to ye kya hai mere kaam ki hai ye to bhejenge hi nahi.
Executive: Nahi mere kaam ki hai kya ye?
Customer: Ye bilkul nahi hai sir kaam ki jab aap lift me kaam karte hai.
Executive: Mai aapko lift chat ke bhejta hu abhi theek hai aur agar aap kar sako to isme turant hi aapko connect karna hoga sir mai sari cheeze mujhe nahi chahiye mere ko to sirf mere kaam ke lead dijiye agar dete ho to theek hai nahi to band kar do bas mera paisa.
Executive: Chinta mat kijiye sir aisa kuch bhi nahi hoga aur
summary:
Concerns:

- Receiving irrelevant leads (lifting instead of lift).

- Dissatisfied with the quality of leads.

- Frustrated with having to filter irrelevant leads.

- Wants only genuine leads related to his work.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Executive offered to send leads via WhatsApp.

- Executive assured to filter leads before sending.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send filtered leads via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, refund, whatsapp
